content.title: Tu Duo Duo's Magic Buttons
content.paragraph1: Tu Duo Duo had a quirky hobby — collecting buttons.
content.paragraph2: Her cloth pocket was stuffed with round buttons, square buttons, and patterned buttons. She even held three of the shiniest ones in her arms when she slept.
content.paragraph3: One evening, raindrops tapped “dada” against the leaves. Tu Duo Duo hid in an old oak tree hollow, and suddenly, her hand brushed against something soft and fluffy.
content.paragraph4: It was a cloth fox missing an eye! An empty thread loop was sewn where its eye should be, making it look so pitiful.
content.paragraph5: “Want to try this?” Tu Duo Duo took out a red button. As soon as she sewed it on, the cloth fox’s eye suddenly flickered — and to her surprise, it spoke: “Thank you, little rabbit!”
content.paragraph6: It turned out the cloth fox was Little Hedgehog’s old toy, which the wind had blown into the tree hollow. Tu Duo Duo found a blue button for its other eye. Right away, the cloth fox jumped up, wiggled the hole in its tail, and said: ”If we had a star-shaped button to fix this spot, I could take you to see the fireflies!“
content.paragraph7: Tu Duo Duo quickly rummaged through her pocket — and sure enough, she felt a star-shaped button that glowed faintly!
content.paragraph8: As soon as she finished sewing it on, the cloth fox’s tail lifted up and carried Tu Duo Duo out of the tree hollow.
content.paragraph9: In the night, fireflies swirled around them like scattered stars. From far away, they heard Little Hedgehog’s excited shout
content.paragraph10: — turns out he was holding a lantern, looking for the cloth fox!
content.paragraph11: Later on, Tu Duo Duo always kept an empty spot in her button pocket. She said it was for the next friend who needed help.
